name: send_email
description: Send an email to a given email address.

recipient.description: The email address of the intended recipient of the email to be sent.

subject.description: The subject of the email to be sent.

body.description: The body content of the email to be sent.

name: generate_image
description: Generate an image using DALL-E 3 given a prompt. Returns the url of the image, which should be sent to the user directly, with no other comment.

prompt.description: A detailed description of the image to be generated.

style.description: The style of the image to be generated. 'Vivid' causes the model to lean towards generating hyper-real and dramatic images. 'Natural' causes the model to produce more natural, less hyper-real looking images.

name: read_text
description: Read a given passage of text and save the resulting audio to the user's computer.

text.description: The passage of text to be read.

output_path.description: The path on the user's computer to save the audio file to. Choose an appropriate file name ending in `.mp3`.
